title: Kim Sung-hwan, Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade, Republic of Korea: Interview - The Middle East - Oxford Business Group

quotes: I am pleased that South Korea and the UAE, along with 14 other countries, signed the Agreement on the Establishment of the GGGI at the 2012 UN Conference on Sustainable Development

organizations.name: Global Green Growth Institute (GGGI)
